pli-tv-bu-vb-pc81:2.1.8: The six are linen, cotton, silk, wool, sunn hemp, and hemp; see [](pli-tv-kd8:3.1.6). | According to [](pli-tv-kd8:21.1.4) this is no smaller than 8 by 4 _sugataṅgula_, “standard fingerbreadths”.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc81:2.1.18: These are all formally appointed officers of the Sangha. | According to [Sp.4.893.16]() (commenting on the _sekhiya_ rules) _khajjaka_ refers to all non-staple foods: _ettha mūlakhādanīyādi sabbaṁ gahetabbaṁ_ , “Here the non-staple foods which are roots, etc. may all be taken.”
